name: Build-a-Pareo
description:
BUILD-A-PAREO v1.0 released 2019-09-27

Art & programming by @cybershoujo on Twitter (also @cybershoujo_art + @cybershoujo_dev!)

Have you ever wanted to build your own Pareo, but never knew how? Are you Pareo herself and you're tired of dying your hair a bajillion different times? Well, have I got the solution for you! Just download the dang thing already.

Drag the sliders to select RGB values.
No built-in screenshotting feature. Use the screen capture software of your choice to save your creation.
Feel free to use it as an icon if you credit @cybershoujo and share the tweet linking to the software download!

BanG Dream! copyright Bushiroad/Craft Egg.
